desc: Starts a Real Time Messaging session.

batch_presence_aware.desc: Batch presence deliveries via subscription. Enabling changes the shape of `presence_change` events. See [batch presence](https://api.slack.com/docs/presence-and-status#batching).

presence_sub.desc: Only deliver presence events when requested by subscription. See [presence subscriptions](https://api.slack.com/docs/presence-and-status#subscriptions).
